attributes.title: Lack of info
attributes.review: I downloaded this app to learn more about Trump and his campaign along with what he's done in his first four years of office. I could not find the information I needed and the info I did find seemed irrelevant to me.

attributes.title: let’s be real guys
attributes.review:
I got this app, for one reason... TRUMP NEVER 
this app crashes on my phone multiple times and made me LITERALLY throw up when I opened it. This app is an absolute DISASTER and it needs to be takes off. Thank you for your time

attributes.title: DO NOT DOWNLOAD
attributes.review: This app is absolutely terrible 🤬 The format makes no sense. I only wanted to download it to help re-elect our dear dear president but this app makes it incredibly difficult to keep up with the hot Cheeto in office 🧚‍♀️💕Please take my advice and save yourself the trouble

attributes.title: Awful!
attributes.review:
I downloaded this app to support my lord and savior donald but it just is absolutely horrible! 🤢 I feel like such a 🤡🤡🤡🤡 I NEVER should have downloaded this app! It destroyed my whole phone!!!! I’ve NEVER had this happen before. 
😡✨😡

attributes.title: TERRIBLE
attributes.review: This app sent me notifications telling me to kill my family and friends. It got into my head. They kept pressuring me over and over. I love my family and friends too much to kill them, i’m not sure why Donald Trump wants them dead. PLEASE BEWARE OF THIS EVIL APP!!

attributes.title: Beluga penis
attributes.review: I was walking home alone the then the holy orange appeared and started singing the dancing queen To a David dobrik outro the he  whipped out his long ah long donkey Kong maga dong and started ass-f**king me for hours this went on all because I downloaded this app, you will get sexually violated if you get this app

attributes.title: This app is HORRIBLE
attributes.review: The app runs extremely slow & there’s is always some Orange human like figure popping up and I don’t know why. This app is BEYOND unhelpful & it doesn’t do what it says. This app is disgusting and I pray that they take this garbage piece of crap DOWN NOW!!!!!

attributes.title: I don’t like Donald trump anyways lol
attributes.review: I don’t like it at all tbh I just came here cuz this one tiktok said if we give it a bad review it will be taken down so like u don’t even like Donald trump so like eh and anyways I’m tryna see if this can actually get taken down lol

attributes.title: Do not download
attributes.review: I downloaded this app to get some stickers of everyone’s favorite, Donald Trump. Instead, there were pictures on naked children all over the app???? And now my phone is barely working due to the virus his app gave me. DO NOT DOWNLOAD

attributes.title: Terrible 🤢😑
attributes.review: I just wanted to say that this app definitely did not meet the requirements I wanted it to. I thought it would be WAYYY better than this. I wish I could give this a 0/5 rating but whatever.
